mapper.insert: INSERT INTO login_history (id, login_time, session_id, created_at) VALUES (#{id}, #{loginTime}, #{sessionId}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT idkey, id, login_time AS loginTime, logout_time AS logoutTime, duration_minutes AS durationMinutes, session_id AS sessionId, created_at AS createdAt FROM login_history WHERE id = #{id} ORDER BY login_time DESC
